snippet.title: Infectonator! World Dominator Flash Game Playthrough
snippet.description:
Infectonator! World Dominator is the follow up to the original Infectonator and the Christmas edition.  This time you can go around the world, picking cities to infect and destroy.  We take down every country one by one, until everything is destroyed and gone.  Use money to grow the strength of the zombie virus, and to upgrade special zombies you collect along the way.

You have allies such as zombie Ronald McDonald, MJ, Kim Jong Il, and more!  You have to kill their living counterparts first, then you can turn the tables and use hero's for your own conquest.

▬▬ Follow Me! ▬▬

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/gamecollectingio
Discord ► https://discord.com/invite/muTFMQZc

#gaming #flashgames #videogames
